title: so @RIOT can we can an AP ITEM soon?

replies.body: seriously why dirk has a lot of branched items for each situation and this {{item:3136}} has literally none.
Because it works for any situation when you upgrade it. Flat pen for MR. % HP damage for tanks.

Then why not make Haunting Mask as Dirk? With more build paths?

We kinda need some diversity here.
Because the one upgrade already works fine
I think another high (100+) AP item would be a good addition once they eventually change Rylai's.
Yes. Otherwise the only 100 AP items would be Dcap/Luden's.

what about the freaking morello?
and archange that would no longer be forgotten?
tbh I forgot about them when writing the post. Morello is great but Archangel's isn't viable on most APs. Especially in this meta. Only champs who can use it right now are Ryze and Cass.

There are only 3 items that provide magic penetration right now, {{item:3020}}, {{item:3151}} and {{item:3135}}. That means AP assassins are basically locked out of boots choice. When you add in how many offensive items provide MR ({{item:3814}}, {{item:3001}}, {{item:3156}}, {{item:3139}}, {{item:3091}}) while only one provides armor ({{item:3157}}), it's pretty clear assassins got the short end of the stick.

You mean the long end ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) 

But in all seriousness, I agree completely. AP assassins need more items, whether it be ap pen or ap/armor. Just something. We have enough AP burst items, but we need to install something with more defensives instead of {{item:3157}} which I'm pretty sure is the only AP item with armor.

Still confuses me why all the good AP defensive items are AP/Health :c

They said they would make Rylais branch out into different item paths. I think the main reason why riot doesn't like to touch ap items as much is simply because supports like zyra could abuse of them (that's just my 5 cents)

i really want an ap tenacity item. that would mean i could FINALLY go a more damaging build on my boy {{champion:85}}. something like 80 ap, 15 tenacity, 10 pen. if fucking maw can have pen, cdr, ad, and mr, why not an ap item with those stats.

If they wanted to add an ap assassin item, they could try making something that procs off of movement abilities (not protobelt) kind of like a sheen effect that increases spell damage or gives magic pen

{{item:3030}} {{item:3152}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3174}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3157}} {{item:1082}} {{item:3041}} were all either reworked or added in the MYMU.  

??????
Yes, we need some of that Armor Penetration. Lethality really set some old users of it back.

Mages already have enough damage, and more than enough utility. 

They're more likely to get nerfed as a whole than get a new item.
